abstract: Melissa Clark demonstrates how to frost a cake. Plus, her recipe for butter cream frosting.
snippet: Melissa Clark demonstrates how to frost a cake. Plus, her recipe for butter cream frosting.
lead_paragraph: In the making of my latest video, on how to frost a cake, I went through vats of butter cream, as you can probably imagine. Here is the recipe I used.

headline.main: Video: How to Frost a Cake
